pe3:2.1: Lobhadhitthanam dosadhitthanam mohadhitthanam alobhadhitthanam adosadhitthanam amohadhitthanam kayakammadhitthanam vacakammadhitthanam manokammadhitthanam saddhindriyadhitthanam viriyindriyadhitthanam satindriyadhitthanam samadhindriyadhitthanam pannindriyadhitthanam.
pe3:5.4: Esa galham karoti bandhananti ragam, iti yo yo dhammo mulanikkhitto, so yevettha dhammo uggavahitabbo.
pe3:5.5: Na bhagava ekam dhammam arabbha annam dhammam deseti.
pe3:5.6: Yassa vitakketi kamavitakko tameva vitakkam kamavitakkena niddisiyati.
pe3:5.8: Subhanupassino bhiyyo tanha pavaddhatiti tameva ragam kamatanhati niddisati.
pe3:5.9: Esa galham karoti bandhananti tameva tanhasamyojanam niddisati.
pe3:6.1: Tattha bhagava ekam dhammam tividham niddisati, nissandato hetuto phalato.
pe3:8.1: Dadanti yam yam danam, idam danamayikam punnakriyam.
pe3:8.4: Bhajanti nam bahu, kittinti yo ca kalyano kittisaddo loke abbhuggacchati, yam bahukassa janassa piyo bhavati manapo ca.
pe3:8.5: Yanca avippatisari kalam karoti ayam nissando.
pe3:8.6: Yam kayassa bheda devesu upapajjatiti idam phalam.
pe3:12.3: Suramerayapananca, yo naro anuyunjatiti doso nidanam.
pe3:12.4: Yo ca suramerayapanam anuyunjati yathaparadaravihari amitta janayanti.
pe3:13.1: Panca verani appahayati pancannam bhikkhapadanam samatikkamanam sabbesam dosajanam sa pannatti, teneva dosajanitena kammena dussilo iti vuccati sopi dhammo hetuna niddisitabbo, nissandena phalena ca.
pe3:14.2: dubbhasitabhasi ca hoti, duccintitacinti ca dukkatakammakari ca.
pe3:14.3: Tattha yam kayena ca vacaya ca parakkamati, idamassa dukkatakammakari.
pe3:14.4: Tayam yatha ca musavadam bhasati yatha pubbaniddittham, idamassa dubbhasita.
pe3:14.5: Yanca sankappeti manoduccaritam byapadam, idamassa duccintitacintita.
pe3:14.6: Yam so imehi tihi balalakkhanehi samannagato tini tajjani dukkhani domanassani anubhavati, so ca hoti sabhaggato va parisaggato va tajjam katham kathanti.
pe3:14.7: Yada bhavati so ca panatipatadidasaakusalakammapatho, so tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedetiti.
pe3:14.8: Puna caparam yada passati coram rajaparadhikam ranna gahitam jivita voropetam, tassevam bhavati sace mamampi raja janeyya mamampi raja gahapetva jivita voropeyyati, so tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
pe3:14.9: Puna caparam balo yada bhavati asana samarulho yava ya me gati bhavissati ito pecca param maranati so tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti iti balalakkhanam hetu.
pe3:14.11: Kayassa bheda nirayesu upapajjati, idam phalam.
pe3:18.1: Yo yam anamataggasamsaram samapanno jayate ca miyate ca, ayam avijjahetuka.
pe3:18.2: Yanipi ca sankharanam payojanani, tanipi avijjapaccayani, yam adassanam buddhavacanassa, ayam avijjasutteyeva niddittham.
pe3:18.3: Yo ca sankhare attato harati pancakkhandhe panca ditthiyo upagacchati.
pe3:18.4: “Etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta”ti idam suttam avijjaya nikkhittam, avijjaya nikkhipitam.
pe3:18.5: Evam sattha sutte nayena dhammena niddisati.
pe3:19.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va “idam dukkhan”ti nappajananti cattari saccani vittharena, yam tattha appajanana, idam dukkham, ayam hetu.
pe3:19.2: Appajananto vividhe sankhare abhisankharoti, ayam nissando.
pe3:19.3: Yanca ditthigatani paramasati “idameva saccam moghamannan”ti ayam nissando.
pe3:19.5: Ayampi dhammo saniddittho hetuto ca phalato ca nissandato ca.
pe3:20.1: Ettha pana keci dhamma sadharana bhavanti.
pe3:20.3: Yatha kim bhave cattarimani, bhikkhave, agatigamanani.
pe3:20.4: Tattha yanca chandagatim gacchati yanca bhayagatim gacchati, ayam lobho akusalamulam.
pe3:20.7: Evam imani tini akusalamulani aditoyeva upaparikkhitabbani.
pe3:20.8: Yattha ekam niddisitabbam, tattha ekam niddisiyati.
pe3:20.9: Tatha dve yatha tini, na hi adihi anikkhitte hetu va nissando va phalam va niddisitabbam.
pe3:23.1: Kattha chanda ca ayam lobho yatha niddittham pubbe.
pe3:26.1: Tattha ya asubhaya upaparikkha, ayam kamesu adinavadassanena pariccago.
pe3:26.2: Indriyesu susamvuto tasseva alobhassa paripuriyam mama ayatanasocitam anupadaya.
pe3:26.4: Iti ayam alobho asubhanupassitaya vatthuto dharayati, so alobho hetu.
pe3:26.5: Indriyesu guttadvarataya gocarato dharayati, bhojanemattannutaya parato dharayati, ayam nissando.
pe3:26.6: Tam ve nappasahati maro, vato selam va pabbatanti, idam phalam.
pe3:26.7: Iti yoyeva dhammo adimhi nikkhitto, soyeva majjhe ceva avasane ca.
pe3:27.1: Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami asamuppannassa kamacchandassa anuppadaya uppannassa va pahanaya, yathayidam asubhanimittam.
pe3:27.2: Tattha asubhanimittam manasikarontassa anuppanno ceva kamacchando na uppajjati, uppanno ca kamacchando pahiyati.
pe3:27.4: Yam puna anuppanno kamarago pariyadiyati ruparagam aruparagam, iti phalam.
pe3:27.5: Iti ayampi ca dhammo niddittho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:30.1: Ekampi ce panamadutthacitto mettayatiti ayam adoso.
pe3:30.2: Nigghatena assado, kusalo tena hotiti tena kusalena dhammena samyutto dhammapannattim gacchati.
pe3:30.3: Kusaloti yatha pannaya panno pandiccena pandito.
pe3:30.4: Pahutamariyo pakaroti punnanti tassayeva vipako ayam lokiyassa, na hi lokuttarassa.
pe3:30.7: Yava abyapajjo bhumiyam bahupunnam pasavati, idam phalam.
pe3:30.8: Iti adoso niddittho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:31.2: Tattha ya mettacetovimutti, ayam ariyadhammesu ragaviraga cetovimutti, lokikaya bhumika hetu, yam sukham ayatim manapo hoti manussanam, ime ekadasa dhamma nissando.
pe3:34.7: Iti amoho niddittho hetuna ca nissandena ca phalena ca.
pe3:35.1: Tinimani, bhikkhave, indriyani anannatannassamitindriyam annindriyam annatavindriyam.
pe3:35.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anabhisametassa dukkhassa ariyasaccassa abhisamayaya chandam janeti vayamati, viriyam arabhati, cittam pagganhati padahati.
pe3:35.6: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu “idam dukkham ariyasaccan”ti yathabhutam pajanati, ya ca maggo, idam annindriyam.
pe3:35.7: Asavakkhaya anasavo hoti, idam vuccati annatavindriyam.
pe3:35.9: Yam chandam janeti vayamati, ya pajanati, ayam nissando.
pe3:35.10: Yena sabbaso asavanam khaya hetu, yam khaye nanamuppajjati, anuppade nananca, ayam nissando.
pe3:35.12: Tattha khina me jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyanti, idam khaye nanam.
pe3:35.13: Naparam itthattayati pajanamiti idam anuppade nanam.
pe3:35.14: Iti imani indriyani amoho niddittho hetuna ca nissandena ca phalena ca.
pe3:36.8: Yanca alobho tini kammani samutthapeti sankappam vayamam samadhinca, ayam alobhassa nissando.
pe3:36.10: Yam tayo dhamme patthapeti sammavacam sammakammantam sammaajivanca, ayam nissando.
pe3:36.11: Tattha yo amoho hetu, yam dve dhamme upatthapeti aviparitadassanampi ca anabhilapanam, ayam nissando.
pe3:36.12: Imassa brahmacariyassa yam phalam, ta dve vimuttiyo ragaviraga cetovimutti avijja viraga ca pannavimutti, idam phalam.
pe3:36.13: Iti imani tini kusalamulani nidditthani hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:39.2: Tattha ye sankhata tulam, te dve dhamma assado ca adinavo ca tulita bhavanti.
pe3:39.4: Ettako adinavo imassa, idam nissarananti iti nibbanam pajanati.
pe3:39.5: Dvihi karanehi atulam na ca sakka tulayitum.
pe3:39.6: Ettakam etam netam paramatthiti tena atulam.
pe3:39.7: Atha papuna ratanam karitva acchariyabhavena atulam.
pe3:39.8: Tattha kusalassa ca abhisambhava janana passana, ayam amoho.
pe3:39.9: Yam tattha nata osirana bhavasankharanam, ayam alobho.
pe3:39.10: Yam ajjhattarato samahitoti vikkhepapatisamharana, ayam adoso.
pe3:39.13: Yo bhavasankharanam samosaranam lobho sammasamadhinam assado, ayam hetu.
pe3:39.14: Yam ajjhattarato avijjandakosam sambhedo, ayam nissando.
pe3:39.15: Sa pavatti imani tini nidditthani kusalamulani hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:40.1: Ettavata esa pavatti ca nivatti ca akusalamulehi pavattati, kusalamulehi nivattatiti imehi ca tihi sabbam akusalamulam samosaranam gacchati.
pe3:40.2: So dhamme va vacanato niddittho tanhati va kodhoti va asampajannanti va anusayoti va makkhoti va palasoti va assatiti va issati va macchariyanti va annananti va, tehi ye ca vatthuhi niddisitabbam.
pe3:40.3: Yassimani dve vacanani dhammapadani nidditthani na so atthi kilesa, yo imesu navasu padesu samodhanam samosaranam gacchati.
pe3:40.4: Ayam kileso, na ca lobho, na ca doso, na ca moho.
pe3:41.1: Yatha akusalamulani, evam kusalani patikkhepena niddisitabbani.
pe3:44.2: Panatipata veramani, adinnadana veramani, kamesumicchacara veramani, idam kayakammadhitthanam.
pe3:50.1: Tinimani manosucaritani, anabhijjha, abyapado, sammaditthi, idam manokammadhitthanam.
pe3:54.2: Panatipata veramani, adinnadana veramani, kamesumicchacara veramani.
pe3:55.1: Iti sadharanani ca suttani asadharanani ca suttani pativijjhitabbani.
pe3:55.2: Pativijjhitva vacaya kayena ca suttassa attho niddisitabbo.
pe3:66.1: Cattaro satipatthana vittharena katabba, idam satindriyadhitthanam.
pe3:69.2: savitakko savicaro, avitakko vicaramatto, avitakko avicaro.
pe3:72.2: sutamayi, cintamayi, bhavanamayi, idam pannindriyadhitthanam suttam, imani indriyadhitthanani asadharanani suttani.
pe3:75.5: Yam yassa sambandham kusalassa va akusalassa va tena tena adhitthanena tam suttam niddisitabbam, natthanno dhammo niddisitabbo.
pe3:75.6: Tattha sadharanam kusalam napi kusalam akusalam yatha sadharanani ca kusalamulani sadharanani ca akusalamulani uppannam kamavitakkam pajahati …pe…
pe3:86.1: Iti therassa mahakaccayanassa jambuvanavasino petakopadese tatiyabhumi suttadhitthanam nama.
